Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory170.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Granton', 3: 'Never thought I, Granton, would be so embarrassed by heroes.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Thanks to the recovery potions, we blasted through the castle with ease and finally reached the second Demon General, Granton.'}
{2: 'Granton', 3: "I don't know about the first two heroes, but... Do you two really believe what the King said?", 4: '1'}
{3: "As Camu and Vera defeated Granton's minions, he looked over, hands on his wounds."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Do you mean me and the Commandant of Gray Raven?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Granton', 3: 'Correct. From what I heard, you already knew that King was plotting something.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Granton', 3: 'Why are you still doing this if you already doubt him!?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Because this is the main quest.', 3: '12', 4: 'Do you know what the King is really up to then?', 5: '13'}
{2: 'Granton', 3: 'Main...what!? Just like the last generation, you heroes always say weird things.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Granton', 3: 'Of course I do...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Granton', 3: 'Anyway, that King is the real monster. He wants to take the artifact from us and control this world.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: 'With this stone alone?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Camu took out the jade after hearing Granton. The latter gnashed his teeth...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Granton', 3: 'Right, this is it. The artifact was originally given to us Demons by the Goddess as an order to keep the Demons alive.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'An order?', 3: '18', 4: 'Who is the Goddess?', 5: '19'}
{2: 'Granton', 3: 'Yeah. Because of this artifact, we Demons have greater strength than humans.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Granton', 3: 'She is... No, there is a spell on her name. We are unable to write or read it out.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Granton', 3: 'The power of the artifact allowed us to summon the Demon King in the last war. The Goddess originally wanted to balance the power of both sides to reduce casualty.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Granton', 3: 'But the Demon King escalated the war without discussing with us. Eventually, the heroes of the revelation arrived and destroyed us. ', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Speaking of which, what exactly does the "hero of the revelation" mean?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'The revelation means the main quest. This is probably how the last generation of heroes called it.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Granton', 3: 'Right... They felt sorry to us, but said they had no choice but to follow the revelation in order to win this game.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Granton', 3: "We saw it as the Goddess' punishment and didn't want to take it back to them. But the humans soon retaliated and wanted to take the artifact away from us.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Granton', 3: 'We could have summoned the Demon King again with the artifact. But we only created four sanctuaries with it and sealed them against all humans.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'You sealed them... But why are we standing right here?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Granton', 3: 'Because you are heroes. Only the heroes can ignore the rules set by the Goddess.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Aha... No wonder he couldn't do this himself.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Granton', 3: "That's why you must stop working for the King. If you really are the heroes, you should do what's best for the world. We can promise to never attack humans again.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Granton', 3: 'And... Please also go back and ask the King to leave us alone.', 4: '1'}
{2: "I'll try.", 3: '1001', 4: "No, I don't think we can.", 5: '33'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: "I met many people like him. Even if you threaten his life, it still won't work.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Just use your brain. Do you think that King will listen to "heroes" like us?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Granton', 3: "I'll take that as a no.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: 'Because we are also the "heroes of the revelation." Give us the artifact now!', 4: '1'}
